name: ApwideGoliveSendEnvironmentInfos{{tag}}
description: Send environment information to Apwide Golive for Jira
author: apwide
helpMarkDown: Learn more about Apwide Golive and Environment Tracking [here](https://www.apwide.com/documentation/cloud/track-environments)

inputs.name: serviceConnection
inputs.label: Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Apwide Golive for Jira connection to use. If needed, select 'Project settings', and create a new 'Service Connection' of type 'Apwide Golive for Jira'.

inputs.name: targetEnvironmentName
inputs.label: Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the environment in Apwide Golive

inputs.name: targetEnvironmentId
inputs.label: Environment ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target environment the version is deployed to

inputs.name: targetAutoCreate
inputs.label: auto create (if not found)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Try to create the target environment with provided information if it does not exist yet in Apwide Golive.

inputs.name: targetApplicationName
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Type the name of the application to select or create the target environment. 
A new Application will be created if it does not exist yet. 
N.B. User associated to your connection must have permission to manage applications in order to automatically create new applications.

inputs.name: targetApplicationId
inputs.label: Application ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an existing application to use to find/create the target environment.

inputs.name: targetCategoryName
inputs.label: Category Name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Type the name of the category to find/create the target environment. 
A new Category will be created if it does not exist yet. 
N.B. User associated to your connection must have permission to manage categories in order to automatically create new categories.

inputs.name: targetCategoryId
inputs.label: Category ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an existing category to use to find/create the target environment.

inputs.name: deploymentDescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Description of the deployment (basic html tags supported). Ex: 
âœ… Job #$(Build.BuildId) - $(Build.DefinitionName)
Requested by: $(Build.RequestedFor) 
Branch: $(Build.SourceBranchName)

inputs.name: deploymentIssueKeys
inputs.label: Jira Issue Keys
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comma separated list of Jira Issue Keys that are deployed. Ex: ECOM-3412,ECOM-6783,PAY-98

inputs.name: deploymentIssueKeysFromCommitHistory
inputs.label: Jira Issue Keys from Commit History
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automatically parse and retrieve the Jira issue keys from commit history to set them as deployed.

inputs.name: deploymentAttributes
inputs.label: Deployment Attributes

inputs.name: environmentStatusName
inputs.label: Status Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type the name of the new status of the environment

inputs.name: environmentStatusId
inputs.label: Status ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the new status of the environment

inputs.name: environmentUrl
inputs.label: Url
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the url of the environment

inputs.name: environmentAttributes
inputs.label: Environment Attributes
